// PC = 0
// ADDS, rm: 01000, rn: 11111， rd: 00000
10101011_00001000_00000011_11100000
// PC = 4
// B #8
10010100_00000000_00000000_00000010
// PC = 8
// ADDS, rm: 01000, rn: 00000， rd: 00000
10101011_00001000_00000000_00000000
// PC = 12
// CMP, rm: NOT AVAILABLE, rn: 11011
11111010_01000000_00001011_01101111
// PC = 16
// SUB, rm: 00001, rn: 00101, rd: 01010
11001011_00000001_00000000_10101010
// PC = 20
// CMP, rm: 01010, rn: 11000 (should not compare)
01111010_01001010_01000011_00000011
// PC = 24
// EOR, rm: 10011, rn: 11110, rd: 01101
11001010_00010011_00000011_11001101
// PC = 28
// cond.B # 8
01010100_00000000_00000000_01001111
// PC = 32
// skipped
00000000_00000000_00000000_00000000
// PC = 36
// immediate ADD 1000, rm: NOT AVAILABLE, rn: 01101 , rd: 01111
10010001_00000000_00100001_10101111
